mapper.select: SELECT A.glamp_id AS glampId , A.glamp_name AS glampingName , A.region , A.star_point_avg AS starPoint , A.review_count AS reviewCount , A.glamp_image AS glampingImg FROM glamping A WHERE A.activate_status = 1 ORDER BY recommend_score DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT A.glamp_id AS glampId , A.glamp_name AS glampingName , A.region , A.star_point_avg AS starPoint , A.review_count AS reviewCount , A.glamp_image AS glampingImg FROM glamping A JOIN ( SELECT A.glamp_id FROM room A JOIN room_service B ON A.room_id = B.room_id WHERE B.service_id IN (4) GROUP BY A.glamp_id ) B ON A.glamp_id = B.glamp_id WHERE A.activate_status = 1 ORDER BY recommend_score DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT A.glamp_id AS glampId , A.glamp_name AS glampingName , A.region , A.star_point_avg AS starPoint , A.review_count AS reviewCount , A.glamp_image AS glampingImg FROM glamping A JOIN ( SELECT A.glamp_id FROM room A JOIN room_service B ON A.room_id = B.room_id WHERE B.service_id IN (3) GROUP BY A.glamp_id ) B ON A.glamp_id = B.glamp_id WHERE A.activate_status = 1 ORDER BY recommend_score DESC LIMIT 3
